typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ItemNumber as integer
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	httpMethod: 'GET',
	timeout: 30,
	requestInterval: 0,
	headers: ['ipp-application-type' -> 'Visma.net Financials', 'ipp-company-id' -> '3464226', 'Authorization' -> 'Bearer c5b7d8ba-4cf8-4312-a520-6709738cae9c'],
	responseFormat: ['type' -> 'json', 'documentForm' -> 'singleDocument']) ~> PimcorePages
PimcorePages derive(TableName = 'VismaExtraTest',
		TotalPages = round(divide(body.metadata.totalCount, 1000), 0,1)) ~> AddColumns
AddColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		TableName as string,
		TotalCount as integer,
		TotalPages as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:[' DELETE  \n FROM [dbo].[Pages] \n WHERE TableName LIKE \'VismaExtraTest\';'],
	postSQLs:[' DELETE  \n FROM [dbo].[Pages] \n WHERE TableName IS NULL;'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		TableName,
		TotalCount = body.metadata.totalCount,
		TotalPages
	)) ~> sinkPimcorePages
